results.text_hl: However, OSI was low in mild-moderate @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ treatment (2.12 +- 0.09) relative to severe @<m>DISEASE_COVID_19</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy (p = 0.001) (Figure 4C).
